# CHANGELOG

<a name="v1.0.4"></a>
## [v1.0.4] - 2022-12-07

### Maintenance

- Bump golang.org/x/text to v0.3.8 due to CVE-2022-32149

<a name="v1.0.3"></a>
## [v1.0.3] - 2022-03-01

### Maintenance

- Bump golang.org/x/text to v0.3.7 due to CVE-2021-38561

<a name="v1.0.2"></a>
## [v1.0.2] - 2021-03-27

### Maintenance

- Change minimum Go version to 1.11

### Bug Fixes

- Add go.mod file
